mapper.insert:
insert into nodejs_match ( match_id, cote_id, cote_name, match_senderId, match_senderName, match_sendTime, match_type, match_title, match_desc, match_text, match_status, collection_count, item_count, create_time, modify_time ) values
( #{item.match_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cote_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cote_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_senderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.match_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.match_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.collection_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.item_count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
